row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@WINDOWS
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
Write-Host Attaching network interface &UC4RB_AWS_NI_ID# to instance &UC4RB_AWS_INSTANCE_ID# ..
$output = java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute $env:EC2_HOME\bin\ec2-attach-network-interface.cmd &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# &UC4RB_AWS_NI_ID# -i &UC4RB_AWS_INSTANCE_ID# -d &UC4RB_AWS_DEV_IDX#
$result = $output | select-string -pattern ^eni-attach -caseSensitive
if (![bool]($result)) { Write-Host Failed to attach network interface $error = [string]::join("`n", $output) Write-Host $error exit 1 }
Write-Host $result Write-Host "`nSuccessfully attach network interface"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS

row.post_process: :SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "eni-attach*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &UC4RB_OUT_ATTACHMENT_ID# = STR_TRIM(&output_line#) : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_ATTACHMENT_ID#, , "WORKFLOW" :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#
